mapper.sql: ve_id, user_id, customer_id, title, content, visited_time, visted_address, visted_longitude, visited_latitude, visitout_time, visitout_address, visitout_longitude, visitout_latitude, state, create_time, update_time, creator, updator, valid, optional1, optional2, optional3, visit_summary, visitout_title, like_count, comment_count
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from visit_events
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into visit_events (ve_id, user_id, customer_id, title, content, visited_time, visted_address, visted_longitude, visited_latitude, visitout_time, visitout_address, visitout_longitude, visitout_latitude, state, create_time, update_time, creator, updator, valid, optional1, optional2, optional3, visit_summary, visitout_title, like_count, comment_count) values (#{veId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vistedAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vistedLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitedLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitoutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{visitoutAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitoutLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitoutLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{optional1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optional2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optional3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitoutTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update visit_events
ve_id = #{record.veId,jdbcType=CHAR},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
customer_id = #{record.customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visited_time = #{record.visitedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
visted_address = #{record.vistedAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visted_longitude = #{record.vistedLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visited_latitude = #{record.visitedLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitout_time = #{record.visitoutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
visitout_address = #{record.visitoutAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitout_longitude = #{record.visitoutLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitout_latitude = #{record.visitoutLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{record.state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updator = #{record.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid = #{record.valid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
optional1 = #{record.optional1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optional2 = #{record.optional2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optional3 = #{record.optional3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visit_summary = #{record.visitSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitout_title = #{record.visitoutTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
like_count = #{record.likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comment_count = #{record.commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update visit_events set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visited_time = #{visitedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, visted_address = #{vistedAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visted_longitude = #{vistedLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visited_latitude = #{visitedLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitout_time = #{visitoutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, visitout_address = #{visitoutAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitout_longitude = #{visitoutLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitout_latitude = #{visitoutLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, optional1 = #{optional1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optional2 = #{optional2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optional3 = #{optional3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visit_summary = #{visitSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitout_title = #{visitoutTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, like_count = #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ve_id = #{veId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ve.*, c.comment_id as c_comment_id, c.user_id AS c_user_id, c.creator AS c_creator, c.create_time AS c_create_time, c.content AS c_content FROM visit_events ve left JOIN comments c ON ve.ve_id = c.event_id where ve.ve_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=CHAR} and ve.valid = 0 ORDER BY c.update_time DESC

SELECT count(ves.ve_id)AS visit_count, ves.creator AS username, ves.user_id AS user_id, sum( CASE WHEN ves.state = 1 THEN 1
ELSE 0 END ) visitOutYet
FROM ( SELECT ve.* FROM visit_events ve, users u WHERE ve.user_id = u.user_id AND u.dept_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )AS ves WHERE ves.update_time BETWEEN #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY ves.user_id

SELECT count(1), DATE_FORMAT(ves.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as create_time, ves.user_id as user_id FROM
(select ve.create_time,ve.user_id from visit_events ve where ve.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ve.create_time BETWEEN #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ) as ves
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ves.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY ves.create_time DESC
